## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0e4fcbb743462bc3f60106db06c33f96012a86c0371a10ab89585424a049e441)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@chatbot-builder/core' @ 10.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
